title: Tech Stocks Power S&P 500 to Record Close After GDP Surprise
description: The S&P 500 Index closed at a record Tuesday as gains in technology stocks offset investor concerns about strong US economic growth potentially delaying interest-rate cuts.
content: The S&P 500 Index closed at a record Tuesday as gains in technology stocks offset investor concerns about strong US economic growth potentially delaying interest-rate cuts.
